focusDamping.name: focusDamping
focusDamping.description:
The focus damping. A higher value means more damping. A value of 0 means no damping.
The damping is applied to the orbit mode.
focusDamping.title: Focus Damping

moveDamping.name: moveDamping
moveDamping.description:
The move damping. In the range 0 to 1, where a value of 0 means no damping and 1 means full
damping. The damping is applied to the fly mode and the orbit mode when panning.
moveDamping.title: Move Damping

moveSpeed.name: moveSpeed
moveSpeed.description: The fly move speed relative to the scene size.
moveSpeed.title: Move Speed

moveFastSpeed.name: moveFastSpeed
moveFastSpeed.description: The fast fly move speed relative to the scene size.
moveFastSpeed.title: Move Fast Speed

moveSlowSpeed.name: moveSlowSpeed
moveSlowSpeed.description: The slow fly move speed relative to the scene size.
moveSlowSpeed.title: Move Slow Speed

rotateDamping.name: rotateDamping
rotateDamping.description:
The rotate damping. In the range 0 to 1, where a value of 0 means no damping and 1 means full
damping. The damping is applied to both the fly and orbit modes.
rotateDamping.title: Rotate Damping

zoomDamping.name: zoomDamping
zoomDamping.description:
The zoom damping. In the range 0 to 1, where a value of 0 means no damping and 1 means full
damping. The damping is applied to the orbit mode.
zoomDamping.title: Zoom Damping

zoomSpeed.name: zoomSpeed
zoomSpeed.description: The zoom speed relative to the scene size.
zoomSpeed.title: Zoom Speed

pitchRange.name: pitchRange
pitchRange.description:
The pitch range. In the range -360 to 360 degrees. The pitch range is applied to the fly mode
and the orbit mode.
pitchRange.title: Pitch Range

yawRange.name: yawRange
yawRange.description:
The yaw range. In the range -360 to 360 degrees. The pitch range is applied to the fly mode
and the orbit mode.
yawRange.title: Yaw Range

joystickEventName.name: joystickEventName
joystickEventName.description:
The joystick event name for the UI position for the base and stick elements.
The event name is appended with the side: 'left' or 'right'.
joystickEventName.title: Joystick Base Event Name

mobileInputLayout.name: mobileInputLayout
mobileInputLayout.description:
The layout of the mobile input. The layout can be one of the following:

- `joystick-joystick`: Two virtual joysticks.
- `joystick-touch`: One virtual joystick and one touch.
- `touch-joystick`: One touch and one virtual joystick.
- `touch-touch`: Two touches.

Default is `joystick-touch`.
mobileInputLayout.title: Use Virtual Gamepad
